insert into money_log (userId, balance, cashback, monetary, type) values (#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{balance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cashback,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{monetary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update money_log set userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, cashback = #{cashback,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, monetary = #{monetary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, userId, balance, cashback, monetary, type from money_log
